column1:
Judge, 
it  appears 
to  me  as 
it  lacks 
lucidity.  The  evidence  of  the  2
witnesses  for the  prosecution  has  not been  analyzed  in  the judgment in
the correct perspective to ascertain  their creditworthiness.  The  concept

of  proof  of  a  criminal  charge  beyond 
reasonable  doubt  has  not  been

properly  applied 
to 
the  evidence  unfolded  by 
the  prosecution 
in  a

critical  approach.  The 
learned  High  Court  judge  has 
failed 
to  discuss
adequately  and  apply  the  concept  of reasonable  doubt  to  the  evidence
